attributes.additional_details:
I would like you to add the ability for people to indicate that they do not support a particular petition. Currently the only way to do this is not to sign but this does not capture the public view since 90% of people may disagree and their view is not captured.
With this amendment, the enhanced petition would give a clearer view of public feeling and would avoid extreme views from seeming to have broad support.
The presentation to parliament over 100K could then be a mean after negative votes were removed.
